actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for purposes of the estate tax for transfers to nonprofit cemetery companies.

summary.text: Allows, under the Internal Revenue Code, a deduction for purposes of the estate tax for transfers to nonprofit cemetery companies.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for purposes of the estate tax for transfers to nonprofit cemetery companies.
